name: Explore
prompt: Residential locations often have lots of food and supplies within them -- if they havenâ€™t been looted already -- if you see houses near you run towards them and pause in front of them.

name: Expand
prompt: There is a row of houses a few blocks west of you, run there.

name: Exploit
prompt: If you see parking around that means that the residents probably fled quickly and left behind supplies, jump off the curb onto a parking spot to mark it.

name: Explore
prompt: Only run in grassy areas here, the zombies can hear your footsteps on the pavement.

name: Expand
prompt: There is a small park with grass coming up on your left, if you can locate it go there and pause for a moment.

name: Exploit
prompt: Run the perimeter of the grassy area to claim it as a human stronghold. this will help future runners escape the zombies.

name: Explore
prompt: The zombies are ready to ambush you on your normal route. take a detour to get to the next waypoint.

name: Expand
prompt: There are zombies up ahead. use the detour on your left to get around them.

name: Exploit
prompt: If the detour is well paved, take advantage of it and sprint to the end.
